snippet: While not directly commenting on suits against Mr. Cosby, Obama said drugging someone and then having nonconsensual sex was nothing short of rape.
abstract: Pres Obama bluntly states that actions of which Bill Cosby is accused, drugging women for sex, constitute rape and should in no way be tolerated by American people.
lead_paragraph: While not directly commenting on suits against Mr. Cosby, Obama said drugging someone and then having nonconsensual sex was nothing short of rape.

headline.main: Asked About Cosby Scandal, Obama Weighs In on a Sexual Violence Discussion
headline.print_headline: Asked About Cosby Scandal, Obama Weighs In on a Sexual Violence Discussion
